biotools.summary: It includes the miRNAs of two model plants, Arabidopsis (Arabidopsis thaliana) and rice (Oryza sativa). Four major functional modules, "SNPs", "Pri-miRNAs", "MiR—Tar", and "Self-reg", are provided.

bioschemas.name: PmiRKB
bioschemas.summary: It includes the miRNAs of two model plants, Arabidopsis (Arabidopsis thaliana) and rice (Oryza sativa). Four major functional modules, "SNPs", "Pri-miRNAs", "MiR—Tar", and "Self-reg", are provided.
